source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_SEQ_00<tab>Yda is eager to rejoin the other Scions.
target: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_SEQ_00<tab>イダは、賢人たちの行方について心当たりがあるようだ。

source:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_SEQ_01 This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to the serpent lieutenant in Little Solace.

※The Main Scenario Guide shows the next available quest. You can toggle it on and off in Character Configuration, under UI Settings.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_SEQ_01本クエストは調整されました。一度破棄し、シルフの仮宿の「双蛇党中牙士」から再受注してください。

※次のメインクエストは、「メインクエストガイド」からも確認することができます。メインクエストガイドの表示/非表示は、メインコマンドの「キャラクターコンフィグ」から「ユーザーインターフェース設定」を選び、変更してください。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_SEQ_02<tab>You finally locate Papalymo, only to find him accompanied by not one, but two Y'shtolas. Confer with Maxio, and devise a strategy to reveal which of the Scions are real and which are impostors.
target: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_SEQ_02<tab>パパリモと、2人のヤ・シュトラを見つけた。付近にいる「マキシオ」に、対策を相談しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_SEQ_03<tab>Maxio suggests that you attempt to unmask any potential impostors all at once. Toss a trueform scalebomb at the suspect Scions, and reveal their true identities.
target: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_SEQ_03<tab>マキシオから、再び<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89A101 /var>をもらった。シルフ領の「パパリモ」たちに「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89A101 /var>」を使おう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_SEQ_04<tab>Maxio's handy gift explodes in a cloud of choking dust, revealing one of the two Y'shtolas to be a skin-changed sylph. Confront the trickster, and show him the error of his ways.
target: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_SEQ_04<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89A101 /var>を使い、悪い子シルフの変装を解いた。距離をとった「悪い子シルフ」に近付き、お友達を倒そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_SEQ_05<tab>You have defeated the touched sylph's boar ally. It is time to confront the sylvan trickster himself.
target: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_SEQ_05<tab>悪い子シルフのお友達を倒した。付近にいる「悪い子シルフ」から話を聞こう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_SEQ_06<tab>Though he has apologized for his mischief, the touched sylph is nevertheless determined to convince you of Lord Ramuh's absence. Return to Papalymo and discuss the obvious deceit.
target: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_SEQ_06<tab>悪い子シルフは、ラムウちゃまはいないと言い残し、今度こそ逃げ出した。シルフ領の「パパリモ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_SEQ_07<tab>Based on your tiny antagonist's dubious claims to the contrary and his own aetheric measurements, Papalymo believes he has pinpointed the spot where Lord Ramuh was summoned. Your audience with the Lord of Levin looms ever closer...
target: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_SEQ_07<tab>パパリモと話した。悪い子シルフの言動とエーテルの測定結果から、蛮神「ラムウ」の神降ろしが行われた場所を特定できたらしい。いよいよ、蛮神「ラムウ」との対面が近付いているようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_MAXIO_000_000<tab>Coughing one is true wise one! Walking one may want to apologize...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_MAXIO_000_000片方は本物だったのでふっち！
さっそく、お話を聞いてみるでふっち。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YDA_000_010<tab>I may not know where Thancred is, but I've got a pretty good idea where Papalymo and Y'shtola will be. They were with me just now.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YDA_000_010本物のサンクレッドがどこにいるかは知らないけど、
パパリモとヤ・シュトラなら、さっきまで一緒だったよ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YDA_000_011<tab>Y'shtola suggested we split up to cover more ground, and took Papalymo with her. Oh no... Do you think one of them might have been a sylph in disguise as well!?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YDA_000_011ヤ・シュトラが「手分けしましょう」って言って、
パパリモを連れていったんだけど……
もしかして、あれも悪い子シルフの変装だったのかな！？

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YDA_000_012<tab>We should probably be after them just in case. Come on! They were headed somewhere to the south!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YDA_000_012いけない、すぐに追いかけて知らせなきゃ！
ふたりは南の方に向かったよ、行こう！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YDA_000_020<tab>Ah... Well, I don't fancy making the wrong choice here. I'll let you do the honors!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YDA_000_020うわぁ……間違えたらすっごい怒られそう……。
こうなったら、キミにお任せだ～！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_MAXIO_000_025<tab>This one cannot tell the difference between them!
target: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_MAXIO_000_025<tab>これが噂に聞く、ヒトの「修羅場」でふっち！？

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_DUMMYYSHTOLA01451_000_030<tab>Trust not a word spoken here...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_DUMMYYSHTOLA01451_000_030あなたが偽者ね！
私の大事な仲間を勝手に連れていこうなんて、
絶対に許さないわよ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YSHTOLA_000_035<tab><sigh> This is farcical...
target: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YSHTOLA_000_035<tab>…………これ、吹き飛ばしてもいいかしら。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_PAPALYMO_000_040<tab>Thank the Twelve! You've found us at last! Wait. I see Yda, but where is...? <gasp> More impostors! Do not attempt to deceive me, sylph! I see what you are!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_PAPALYMO_000_040ああ、君、いいところに！
この状況、どうにかしてくれよ……。
ヤ・シュトラといたら、別のヤ・シュトラが出てきてさ……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_PAPALYMO_000_041<tab>...But if, by some faint chance, you truly <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> my good friend <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, mayhap you would consult Maxio over there─if Maxio he truly is─on the subject of how to dispel these infernal sylvan enchantments.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_PAPALYMO_000_041……マキシオと一緒なのかい？
だったら、対策がないか相談してみてくれよ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_PAPALYMO_000_050<tab>Caught between a rock and a hard place... Ack! Why did it have to be two Y'shtolas!? I should have been perfectly happy to give any number of Ydas an experimental smack...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_PAPALYMO_000_050ああもう、何でこんなことに！
この状況、どうにかしてくれよ……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_MAXIO_000_060<tab>Hmmm... This one suggests hitting three wise ones with one stone!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_MAXIO_000_060ふっちっち……。
疑わしきは、まとめてドッカンでふっち！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_MAXIO_000_061<tab>If wise ones suspect walking one is actually skin-changing one, walking one is not likely to get a second opportunity to throw a scalebomb in wise ones' presence. So walking one must aim carefully so that all wise ones are caught in the same scalebomb's boom!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_MAXIO_000_061ということで、追加の「」でふっち～！
この際、真ん中のヒトも確かめておくでふっち。
3人にむけて、思いっきり投げつけるでふっち！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_MAXIO_000_070<tab>Walking one should throw a scalebomb so it hits all the wise ones! Blow away walking one's doubts all at once!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_MAXIO_000_0703人に向けて「」を投げるでふっち！
疑わしきは、まとめてドッカンでふっち！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YSHTOLA_000_080<tab><cough> <splutter> Was that truly necessary?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YSHTOLA_000_080けほっ……けほっ……！
何なの、鱗粉……！？

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YDA_000_081<tab>Look! That one's the sylph!
target: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YDA_000_081<tab>見て、あっちが偽者だっ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_DUMMYYSHTOLA01451_000_082<tab><cough> This one's trick has failed! But w-walking ones have not won yet!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_DUMMYYSHTOLA01451_000_082ぶわっ、バレたのでふっち！
し、仕切り直しでふっち！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_DUMMYYSHTOLA01451_000_083<tab>This one will not allow walking ones to pass! C-Come any closer, and this one's friends will be angry!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_DUMMYYSHTOLA01451_000_083ぜ、絶対に近づくんじゃないでふっち！
わたぴに近づいたら、お友達が黙ってないでふっち～！！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_PAPALYMO_000_084<tab>So the little rascal means to stand his ground, does he? How very courageous. Would you do the honors, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_PAPALYMO_000_084……逃げるんじゃないのか？
あれじゃ、まるで通せんぼだな……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_THANCRED_000_085<tab>Greetings! I see you've all found each other. 'Twould seem I was a mite overzealous in my attempts to evade our sylvan ambushers. I was a malm away by the time I realized I was alone.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_THANCRED_000_085おお、やっとみんなに合流できた。
気がついたら周りに誰もいなくて、驚いたよ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_THANCRED_000_086<tab>...Is aught amiss? Do I have something on my face?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_THANCRED_000_086……ど、どうした？
みんなして、俺を疑うような目で見て。
俺、何かおかしいか……？

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_PAPALYMO_000_087<tab>Hmm...<var 1A 02 /var>reasonably<var 1A 01 /var> convincing. But one cannot be too careful! Remind me, Thancred: what was the reason for our little excursion into the Sylphlands?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_PAPALYMO_000_087……なあ、サンクレッド。
僕たちがここへ来た目的は、なんだったかな？

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_THANCRED_000_088<tab>Did you take a tumble and bump your head, old friend? We're here to locate the site of the summoning so that <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> might parley with Lord Ramuh.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_THANCRED_000_088おいおい、まさか忘れたってことはないだろ。
蛮神「ラムウ」と)) (( )) 02 /var>の対話のために、
神降ろしされた場所を突き止めに来たんだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YDA_000_089<tab>Hmm... Too easy... A-HA! Why don't you tell us what you think of <var 1A 02 /var>F'lhaminn<var 1A 01 /var>?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YDA_000_089うんうん、そうだったよね～。
……ところでさ、フ・ラミンって今でも美人だと思わない？

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_THANCRED_000_090<tab>...Truly? You would have me speak of the Songstress of Ul'dah? As you will. She is as an exquisite rose that withers not with the passing of years─
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_THANCRED_000_090え？　あ、ああ！
「ウルダハの歌姫」と呼ばれていたころも憧れたものだが、
今の姿もまた、濃紅の薔薇のように美しいよ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YSHTOLA_000_091<tab>Charming as ever. I daresay you are perpetually beset upon all sides by swooning beauties...?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YSHTOLA_000_091お上手だこと……。
最近は、口説く相手が多くて大変ね、色男さん？

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_THANCRED_000_092<tab>Please, Y'shtola─I do not seek to make them swoon. Poetry rises unbidden to my lips when I behold a maiden's fair countenance. 'Tis the curse of my minstrel blood.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_THANCRED_000_092よしてくれよ、ヤ・シュトラ。
彼女たちを見ていると、詩が湧き上がってくるだけだ。
愛の吟遊詩人としての血が騒ぐのさ……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YSHTOLA_000_093<tab>Enough. If this is not the real Thancred, then I believe we have found a suitable replacement.
target: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YSHTOLA_000_093<tab>……本物ね。

source:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_PAPALYMO_000_094Indeed.
Well, that seems like quite enough entertainment for one day. 'Tis past time we returned to the task at hand.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_PAPALYMO_000_094はぁ、何だか気が抜けたよ。
……でも、悠長にしてられるのもここまでだぞ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_PAPALYMO_000_095<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, would you mind approaching our touched friend? If I'm not very much mistaken, his decision to stand his ground stems from something more than mere bravery.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_PAPALYMO_000_095)) (( )) 03 /var>、あの悪い子シルフに近づいてみよう。
あいつ、引き下がれない理由があるんだ……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_THANCRED_000_100<tab>What did she mean, “the <var 1A 02 /var>real<var 1A 01 /var> Thancred”? And what's this about replacing me? Hmph! This must be how Yda feels most of the time...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_THANCRED_000_100本物？　本物ってどういうことだ？
俺の偽者でもいたのか？
……やれやれ、人気者は辛いな。

source:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YDA_000_105Sooo...Thancred is Thancred, Papalymo is Papalymo, Y'shtola is Y'shtola, and you are you, right? Well, that's easy enough to remember. This one's name is Yda, in case walking one was wondering.
...JOKE! I'm joking! Don't you DARE scalebomb me again!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YDA_000_105サンクレッドがサンクレッドでよかったよねぇ。
さて、そんなことより蛮神「ラムウ」を探そうよ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_PAPALYMO_000_110<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you must needs confront that touched sylph. He's plainly attempting to keep us from something important...
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_PAPALYMO_000_110)) (( )) 03 /var>、あの悪い子シルフに近づいてみよう。
僕の推測が正しければ、
あいつ、引き下がれない理由があるんだ……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YSHTOLA_000_115<tab>I would have words with my diminutive impersonator on the finer details of his portrayal...but the mission must take precedence. Mayhap 'tis best that you approach him alone.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YSHTOLA_000_115下手な変装なんてしてくれて、言いたいこともあるけれど……
全員で近づいたら、さすがに怯えて逃げそうね。
あなたに託すわ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_MAXIO_000_120<tab>Touched one has many dangerous ones as friends. Walking one must be very careful!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_MAXIO_000_120悪い子シルフには、アブないお友達がたくさんいるでふっち。
気をつけるでふっち！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_DUMMYYSHTOLA01451_000_125<tab>This one warned walking ones to stay away!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_DUMMYYSHTOLA01451_000_125ち、近づくんじゃないでふっち！
あっち行けでふっち！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_DUMMYYSHTOLA01451_000_130<tab><gasp> Walking one is too strong! This one surrenders. This one is sorry for playing tricks on wise ones.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_DUMMYYSHTOLA01451_000_130うう……お友達が黙っちゃったでふっち……。
し、仕方がないでふっち……降参でふっち……。
お前らをからかったことは、謝ってやるでふっち。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_DUMMYYSHTOLA01451_000_131<tab>But great and powerful one, Lord Ramuh, is not here! So there is no need for wise ones to go any further. No, no─no need at all. Wise ones <var 1A 02 /var>definitely must not go any further<var 1A 01 /var>. This one would not want wise ones to get lost.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_DUMMYYSHTOLA01451_000_131でも、ラムウちゃまはどこにもいないでふっち！
だから、この先には絶対に入ってくるなでふっち！
絶対に絶対でふっち！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YSHTOLA_000_140<tab>Hmph. Well, at least the sylph offered some manner of apology for his mischief. But more importantly, his insistence that we proceed no further seems rather revealing, does it not?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_YSHTOLA_000_140ありがとう、ちょっとすっきりしたわ。
……今の悪い子シルフの発言、決定的ね。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_MAXIO_000_145<tab>Is walking one unharmed? This one would not like to see walking one in pain.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_MAXIO_000_145大丈夫でふっち？
お怪我はないでふっち？

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_PAPALYMO_000_150<tab>We overheard your exchange with our tormentor. His clumsy attempt at deceit would almost be endearing if time were not of the essence.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_PAPALYMO_000_150君たちの話、聞こえてたよ。
悪い子シルフは、この期に及んで嘘をついてるようだね。

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_PAPALYMO_000_151<tab>Happily, I managed to take a reading of the surrounding area while you had his attention. As I suspected, the site of the Lord of Levin's summoning is very close indeed!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_PAPALYMO_000_151さっきの隙に、この周辺のエーテルも測定してみたけれど……
蛮神「ラムウ」の神降ろしが行われた場所、間違いなく掴んだぞ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_POPMESSAGE_000_000<tab>You sense a hostile presence!
target: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_POPMESSAGE_000_000<tab>敵の気配を感じた！！

source: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_POP_MESSAGE<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_GAIUSE310_01451_POP_MESSAGE<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
